name: Aquarium Stage
effectText: WATER monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle with a non-WATER monster. "Aquaactress" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 Aqua monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Aqua monsters.
